page.title: 09CHILDREN'S LEISURE (CONTD)
page.content: On Saturdays,{Simon}watches a television magazine programme called {'The Saturday Picture Show'.}It is especially for children. It has hobbies, pop-groups and cartoons. In the afternoon he plays{football}at the {Monty Hinds Boys Club.} In the morning{Damian}watches cartoons on{television}then he goes to {Saturday Club}at the{Methodist Church. In the afternoons he plays on his {computer}or on his{B.M.X. bicycle.} Every Saturday, Steve's comics are delivered from the newsagent. He reads his comics then he watches the children's programmes on television.
